name: The Old Ruins
description:
This game was made for the WeeklyGameJam 81

I used kenny.nl assets for this project along side some of my own art.

1. Use FireFox for best overall performance

2. Audio may lag or stutter (specially in Chrome)

3. The screen may pause for a period of time before loading scene (specially in Chrome)

4. For best performance and best gameplay download the windows version
